com.tlabs.textparser

Class Value

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tlabs.textparser.Value

  • public class Value
extends java.lang.Object
    A value is a numeric entity, might have a constraint, a value and a unit, e.g. "max. 3000 euro"
    Author:
    burkhardt.felix
